sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`{{ render '@primary-button' pageContext merge=true}}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"when-to-use"}}>{`When to use`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Use buttons to trigger actions or navigate between views.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"when-not-to-use"}}>{`When not to use`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Don't use buttons inline with text. Instead, use simple links.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"how-to-style"}}>{`How to style`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Start by choosing a variation based on its use case. Use large and full-width options for quick style matching. For more nuanced styling, i.e. setting a custom height, use specificity in the parent component. For example, target `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.some-skill .some-component .btn`}</MDXTag>{` to achieve higher specificity and override default styling.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="th">{`Property`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="th">{`Details`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`One of `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"/components/detail/primary-button"}}>{`primary`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"/components/detail/secondary-button"}}>{`secondary`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"/components/detail/simple-button"}}>{`simple`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"/components/detail/caution-button"}}>{`caution`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Text`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Optional; Text to show`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Icon`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Optional; Icon to show`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`button`}</MDXTag>{`. Use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`submit`}</MDXTag>{` to submit a form.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Variation; one of `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/primary-button"}}>{`primary`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/secondary-button"}}>{`secondary`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/simple-button"}}>{`simple`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/caution-button"}}>{`caution`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Text`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Icon`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Type; defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`button`}</MDXTag>{`. Set to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`submit`}</MDXTag>{` if used to submit a form.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Is Loading; defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`false`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Is Disabled; defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`false`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Is Full Width; defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`false`}</MDXTag>{`,`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Is Large; defaults to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`false`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"uses-these-components"}}>{`Uses these components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/loader"}}>{`Loader`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"used-in-these-components"}}>{`Used in these components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"/components/detail/accordion"}}>{`Accordion`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
